title: League of legends OCE Constant 200 ping
body:
League of Legends need to fix their servers and connections. The recent games I've played in, made me lag like hell.  I've recently played DoTA 2 and the servers actually don't lag like hell. I've played League of Legends when no one else is using the internet and my internet is topped up at around 20Mbps, while my ping is around 10 ms or so. So I wonder what's the problem making my games lag?      {{summoner:3}}  
I would prefer a friendly answer instead of a fanboy/girl flaming about that my internet connection is horrid and LoL is the best.

replies.body:
>while my ping is around 10 ms

Is that the ping that the League of Legends game executable is claiming to have or is that sourced from an alternative source, like a speed-tester?

What's your OS and ISP?
